name: SadTrombone
0:
”Alexa, play Sad Trombone.”
”Alexa, tell Sad Trombone to play.”
”Alexa, ask Sad Trombone to say sad trombone.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sad trombone
des:
The Official Sad Trombone... when a rim shot just isn't appropriate. The result of too much free time in the office, this medium was created as the anti-rim shot. We have continued over the years to deliver one product that culminates failure.

'Vikings' Sad Trombone audio by @bixboxcar and @moonhead
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
